attributes.action: NATIONAL CAMPAIGN TO TEACH CHILDREN HOW TO' RESPECT 'PEOPLE AND PROPERTY!
attributes.additional_details: A national decline in recent years in the RESPECT of people and property in the UK has now been seen worldwide...something has to be done. I call on ALL law abiding citizens to ask OUR Government, Council Leaders, Police and Schools to have a national campaign to help children understand the word 'RESPECT' to help our future society !!!!!
